long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you are merchant of blogapy(https://blogpay.co.kr/), you should upload your own product using blogpay EZ editor to write down product details.
But this EZ editor does not save your product detail contents by itself. The only way to save your product contents is click save button by yourself. If not, your all contents will be vaporized with just one accidental move.
To save your mental and life, I made autosaver of EZ editor. This extension automatically save product contents every one minute. With this extension, your product contents will be saved and your life will also be saved.

The only functionality : Save product contents every minute without any required user action.
